name: Darkmantle
movement: slow walk of 10 feet and fast flight of 30 feet
description: A shadowy, octopus-like creature that clings to cavern ceilings and has a leathery, dark-colored body that blends into the shadows.
memorable: Its ability to create magical darkness and grapple its prey make it a deadly ambush predator.
goals: To ambush and smother prey passing below.
relations: Frequently found in caves alongside other subterranean creatures.
environment: Caves or the Underdark, using camouflage in dark areas.
strengths: Blindsight up to 60 feet, resistance to exhaustion and the frightened condition.
weaknesses: Relatively low armor class and hit points make it vulnerable if discovered.
attacks: Can perform Crush attacks that bludgeon and can attach itself to the target, causing blindness.
most_powerful_ability: Darkness Aura, creating an area of magical darkness that impairs visibility.
senses: Has blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to detect creatures in total darkness.
skills: Skilled in Stealth, able to hide effectively from prey.
additional_information: False appearance allows it to blend seamlessly with cave formations.
Can deal damage to attackers with its Jagged Hide.
Creates a tactical advantage by obscuring vision during combat.
While attached to a target, it can knock the target prone with a successful move.
Its multiattack provides both darkness creation and offensive capabilities.
test_queries: shadowy cave predator with magical darkness
small ambush creature that smothers its prey
creature that blends with stalactites and attacks
darkness aura granting tactical advantage in caves
